member.name: T:Dfc.ProviderPortal.Venues.API.Controllers.ProvidersController
member.summary: Controller classs for Venues API Provider actions moved from VenuesController to allow Swagger to resolve routes properly

member.name: M:Dfc.ProviderPortal.Venues.API.Controllers.ProvidersController.GetByPRN(System.Int32)
member.summary: All venues by PRN, for example: GET api/providers/10000409/venues

member.name: M:Dfc.ProviderPortal.Venues.API.Controllers.ProvidersController.GetByPRNAndName(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: All venues by PRN with an exact (case sensitive) match on name, for example: GET api/providers/10000409/venues/DENTON COMMUNITY COLLEGE

member.name: M:Dfc.ProviderPortal.Venues.API.Controllers.VenuesController.Get
member.summary: All venues, for example: GET api/venues

member.name: M:Dfc.ProviderPortal.Venues.API.Controllers.VenuesController.Get(System.Guid)
member.summary: Venue (if any) with matching id, for example: GET api/venues/620a83bf-902f-4257-9a37-2c9a95276ad3

member.name: M:Dfc.ProviderPortal.Venues.API.Controllers.VenuesController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Venue (if any) with matching id, for example: GET api/venues/3010917

member.name: M:Dfc.ProviderPortal.Venues.API.Controllers.VenuesController.Post(Dfc.ProviderPortal.Venues.Models.Venue)
member.summary: Create new venue via post POST api/venues
